Reading Group - 2017 Fall Semester

Machine Learning - Matrix Analysis

Time & Location

  • 4 pm every Sunday
  • Whiteboard near the north corridor on 3rd Floor BC Building

    • Reference Books

  • Christopher M. Bishop. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning. Springer, 2013.
  • 张贤达. 矩阵分析与应用. 清华大学出版社, 2004.
